properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 7:07AM HST until March 1 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SUMMITS AND UPPER ELEVATIONS OF
MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND ...

.A cold core low over the islands is bringing very cold
temperatures, which is supporting wintry weather above 9000 feet.

* WHAT...Freezing rain and snow. Additional snow accumulations of
up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Haleakala Summit and Big Island Summits.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, leading to road
closures. The roads to the summits will likely be impacted with
ice and patchy snow. Postpone travel plans to the summits until
weather conditions improve. Warmer and drier conditions are
expected by Monday.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for
slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while
driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY
